details: Focuses on LLM-based autonomous agents and their applications
For 3-unit enrollment: Implementation (coding) component required with programmatic LLM interaction

Search and planning techniques for LLM agents
Multi-agent systems and coordination
Specialized domains for LLM agents (mathematics, programming)
Responsible and ethical development of autonomous systems

books.name: Introduction to Large Language Models by Tanmoy Chakraborty (2024)
details: Comprehensive guide for understanding foundations and advancements of generative AI for text
Published by Wiley India in 2024
The author has secured over 100 million INR in funding from industry and government agencies
Content progression:
Linguistic concepts and NLP fundamentals
Word embeddings and attention mechanisms
Transformer architectures and pre-training techniques
Fine-tuning strategies and evaluation methods
Ethical considerations and future directions
Includes visual aids, exercises, and practical resources
Available in both print and eBook formats

ragResources.title: Comprehensive RAG Resources with LangChain
details: LangChain provides detailed documentation for implementing RAG systems:
Part 1: Introduces basic RAG concepts and implementation
Part 2: Extends to conversation-style interactions and multi-step retrieval
Key components covered in the tutorials:
Document loading and chunking
Vector storage and retrieval mechanisms
Query processing and augmentation
Integration with LLMs for generation
The documentation includes code examples for different RAG architectures and optimization techniques
Advanced tutorials cover hybrid search, semantic search, and fine-tuning for specific domains

chainOfThoughtGuide.title: Chain of Thought Prompting Implementation (Relevance AI Guide)

Mathematical problem solving

Integration guidance for various LLM platforms and APIs
